Group (2012-2022):

Introduction

Sarang (사랑) is a singer under Great Company. She is a former member of the girl groups Switch Berry and Daydream, and the dance team Happiness. Sarang joined Switch Berry sometime in late 2017, after some of the members decided to leave the group. Though she left the group sometime after, never officially debuting as a member.
